mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CLUB WHERE REGULARTYPE = 1
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CLUB WHERE REGULARTYPE = 0

SELECT c.CLUBNO, c.CLUBTITLE, c.CLUBGENDER, c.AGELIMIT, c.CATEGORY, c.CITY, c.DISTRICT, c.REGULARTYPE, c.MAXMEMBER, c.USERID, c.DDAY, c.CLUBIMAGE, c.DETAILINFO, c.RECRUITMENT, m.USERNAME as leaderName FROM CLUB c JOIN MEMBER m ON c.USERID = m.USERID WHERE c.CLUBNO = #{clubNo}
SELECT m.USERNAME FROM CLUBMEMBER cm JOIN MEMBER m ON cm.USERID = m.USERID WHERE cm.CLUBNO = #{clubNo} AND cm.ISACCEPT = 1
SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN userGender = 'M' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS maleCount, SUM(CASE WHEN userGender = 'W' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS femaleCount FROM MEMBER
SELECT CATEGORY, COUNT(*) AS categoryCount FROM CLUB GROUP BY CATEGORY ORDER BY categoryCount DESC

SELECT participation_level, COUNT(*) AS user_count FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN participation_count = 0 THEN '0개 모임 참여' WHEN participation_count = 1 THEN '1개 모임 참여' WHEN participation_count BETWEEN 2 AND 3 THEN '2~3개 모임 참여' ELSE '4개 이상 모임 참여' END AS participation_level FROM ( SELECT m.USERID, NVL(COUNT(cm.CLUBNO), 0) AS participation_count FROM MEMBER m LEFT JOIN CLUBMEMBER cm ON m.USERID = cm.USERID GROUP BY m.USERID ) ) GROUP BY participation_level ORDER BY participation_level
